name: Werewolf City
description:
Hide, Fight, and Work together to take over the city in this one shot RPG! Choose between the Alpha, Assassin, Crafty, Coward, Medic, or Talker and beat out the other packs to be the new rulers of the rising lycanthrope city you're working to turn!  

Werewolf city uses a d10 system, simple and perfect for anyone new or experienced!
